meanings.definition: Used as a greeting or to attract someone's attention.
meanings.sent3: Yo, did you see that bird?
meanings.sent4: Yo, the sun is shining so brightly!
meanings.sent5: Yo, listen carefully to what I'm about to say.

meanings.sent1: Hey, yo, can you pass me that book?
meanings.sent2: I need yo help with this math problem.
meanings.sent4: Yo, you're the best friend ever!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of excitement or approval.
meanings.sent3: Yo, I just won a prize!
meanings.sent4: Yo, the party was so much fun!
meanings.sent5: Yo, I can't believe how good that cake tastes!
